data.comment: The match is underway at Stade de la Meinau.
Bordeaux's Pablo Castro has been booked in Strasbourg.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Bordeaux.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Bordeaux will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Strasbourg.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Alexander Djiku for Strasbourg has been booked by Benoit Bastien and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Strasbourg.
Free kick Strasbourg.
Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hwang Ui-Jo for Bordeaux gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Strasbourg.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Bordeaux.
Benoit Bastien signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 15, Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 20, Strasbourg push forward at Stade de la Meinau and Adrien Thomasson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bordeaux defence.
Strasbourg push forward at Stade de la Meinau and Mohamed Simakan gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Bordeaux defence.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benoit Bastien signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Benoit Bastien signals a throw-in for Bordeaux, close to Strasbourg's area.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Strasbourg.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Bordeaux in Strasbourg.
In the minute 27, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Bordeaux.
Free kick Bordeaux.
Bordeaux drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Bordeaux at Stade de la Meinau.
Bordeaux advance rapidly upfield but Benoit Bastien blows for offside.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Strasbourg.
In the minute 38, Bordeaux's Pablo Castro scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Hatem Ben Arfa instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 41, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Strasbourg push upfield but Benoit Bastien quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 45, Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Strasbourg's Ludovic Ajorque gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Free kick Strasbourg.
Benoit Bastien awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
In Strasbourg Bordeaux's Hwang Ui-Jo is caught offside.
In the minute 50, Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Important block from the Bordeaux defence as Ibrahima Sissoko fires in a strike for Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Bordeaux.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bordeaux's Remi Oudin gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Meinau. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hatem Ben Arfa for Bordeaux drives towards goal at Stade de la Meinau. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Benoit Bastien awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, Habib Diallo is replacing Jeanricner Bellegarde for the home team.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a first substitution, with Lucien Kevin Zohi replacing Mehdi Chahiri.
In the minute 58, Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
In the minute 60, Strasbourg are pushing forward but Adrien Thomasson's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Hwang Ui-Jo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bordeaux.
In the minute 64, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Bordeaux.
In the minute 66, In Strasbourg Strasbourg drive forward through Adrien Thomasson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Otavio puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Remi Oudin with an assist there.
In the minute 67, The away team have replaced Hwang Ui-Jo with Jimmy Briand. This is the first substitution made today by Jean-Louis Gasset.
Benoit Bastien awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Benoit Bastien signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
In the minute 71, Remi Oudin (Bordeaux) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Dimitri Lienard is replacing Jean-Eudes Aholou for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 72, Strasbourg needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bordeaux's half?
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 75, Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's second substitution at Stade de la Meinau with Yacine Adli replacing Mehdi Zerkane.
Jean-Louis Gasset is making the team's third substitution at Stade de la Meinau with Nicolas De Preville replacing Hatem Ben Arfa.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a fourth substitution, with Lionel Carole replacing Kenny Lala.
Majeed Waris is replacing Adrien Thomasson for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 80, Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Yacine Adli for Bordeaux who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ibrahima Sissoko (Strasbourg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Strasbourg.
Bordeaux have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
In the minute 84, Yacine Adli has recovered and rejoins the match in Strasbourg.
Can Bordeaux capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Strasbourg's half?
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick Strasbourg.
Benoit Bastien signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Bordeaux.
The away team replace Youssouf Sabaly with Enock Kwateng.
In Strasbourg, Habib Diallo (Strasbourg) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Stade de la Meinau.
Benoit Bastien awards the away team a throw-in.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Can Strasbourg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Bordeaux needs to be cautious. Strasbourg have an attacking throw-in.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Bordeaux make their fifth substitution with Maxime Poundje replacing Remi Oudin.
